content:
The code chunk enables event handling for entering a new phase in the DistancePhasedNode class by checking if there is a valid next phase (phase+1) within bounds. If so, it retrieves the corresponding phase alias, accepts an enter-phase event with that alias, and un-stashes the associated sphere, making it visible to trigger proximity events.

if 0 <= phase+1 < len(self._colSpheres):
            phaseName = self.getPhaseAlias(phase+1)
            self.accept(self.__getEnterEvent(phaseName),
                        self.__handleEnterEvent,
                        extraArgs = [phaseName])
            self._colSpheres[phase+1].unstash()
